item.g:description: In favour of the sleek, straight and simple - update your space with three dimensional geometric shapes for the contemporary home.

item.g:description: An abstract set sculpted from brass and plated in soft mellow gold. Sculptures to add that wow-factor to any room.

item.g:description: A fusion of luxury living with contemporary sensibilities. The three dimensional Music Stand is composed of steel plated in soft gold and displayed on a slab of black marble.

item.g:description: An adorable partridge perched on a branch in clean, minimal form. Fashioned in warm gold with a crystal base, add charming allure to your space.

item.g:description: An intricate and hauntingly powerful figurine that evokes contemplation. Cast in iron and coated in bronze.

item.g:description: Rearing in unbridled magnificence. With intricate detail and ethereal design, this iron and natural black marble beauty is an iconic collectable.

item.g:description: Vivid and whimsical. Asymmetric arcs in warm gold light up the room with modern simplicity.

item.g:description: A striking piece of functional design with distinctive sculptural appeal. A pendant lamp adorned with suspended cymbal in a brushed brass finish that refracts warm light across the room.
